author: alja
body:
Fireworks/Calo
Merge development from CVS HEAD. 
Fix bug in scaling of rec-hits when multiple views of same type are added.

Fireworks/ParticleFlow
Merge development from CVS HEAD. 
Add string parameter in collection controller to set RecHit collection name.

Fireworks/Core
Add string type for proxy builder parameters.
title: CMSSW_6_1_X_SLHC  Improvement of rec-hit visualization
